name: The Wailing of the Forest
description:
A short horror game about a folkloric ghost from the Costa Rican rainforest. Created for 2023's Global Game Jam. 

I took inspiration from the folkloric Costa Rican legend of La Llorona, old silent films, and a nightmare I had the other day.

It aims to be creepy rather than terrifying, but still, play it at your own risk. A headset is very much recommended.

If the game gave you something to talk about, consider donating. Any constructive feedback is greatly appreciated.
